One of the best ways to keep improving our brand is to listen to our customers. We love it when people reach out to us with questions, comments, ideas, and feedback.

Saturday delivery is not guaranteed and subject to carrier availability. Please visit UPS.com for more information.

settings.title: Under the Weather Cares
settings.content: At Under the Weather®, our mission is to create memorable outdoor experiences with our weatherproof portable pop-up Pods. We believe everyone deserves a safe space that’s comfortable, accessible and inviting, whether they’re living alone, as a family or as a community. We also believe in the importance of giving back to the community which supports us.

settings.label: Where did you hear about us?

settings.contact_heading: Easy ways to get in touch
settings.contact_content:
Include a contact form section right on your home page, to make it easy for your shoppers to reach you. You can control the position and alignment of the form and text, and you can also include links within your text. Some of the info you might want to include are your store hours, location and the various ways that people can reach you:

• Send us an email
• Give us a call at 1-800-ZEN-YOGA
• Read more on our Contact page

settings.title: UTW
settings.subtitle: ULTIMATE GEAR FOR OUTDOOR WARRIORS

settings.title: Sam Wilder
settings.description: Yoga has the power to heal. I love sharing my passion with my team and the community.

settings.title: Natasha Ulrich
settings.description: Outdoor activities are my favourite... even in -40 degree weather!

settings.title: David Jones
settings.description: I love hosting events to bring the community together.

settings.title: Gil Sadri
settings.description: I love helping others and pushing them to do their best!

settings.title: Say Hello to the Pod Squad
settings.text: Here at Under the Weather®, it’s all about the Pod experience. And that begins with the UTW Pod Specialists. They live, eat and breathe pop-up Pods, from the front office to the warehouse, from concept to production to getting the word out–they work tirelessly to deliver superior Pod products and high-quality service to customers everywhere. So, it’s no wonder they’re considered part of the family, and our loyal Pod owners a part of the extended family, known as the PodSquad™. And, thanks to both the team and the PodSquad™, our company is growing and thriving. In less than a decade Under the Weather® is the leading personal pop-up Pod in the U.S. with multiple patents and distribution in Canada, Australia, and Europe. And, as they say, the rest is history.

settings.title: Warm-up Gear for the Long Trek
settings.subtitle: Our pop-up background tents are great for hitting the trails.

settings.title: Page Banner Template
settings.subtitle: Create an amazing page with a full-width banner

settings.title: When I popped my UTWâ„¢ Pod up for the first time the wires seem twisted. Is there a way to fix this?
settings.subtitle: It is normal for the UTWPod™ to be a little stiff and the wires slightly bent from being packaged, stored and shipped. We recommend you open your Pod upon receipt, lay it flat, and make sure the wires lay flat. It is all right to step on them firmly to flatten them and, once popped up, do another quick check to ensure the wires are straight, straightening them by hand if necessary.

settings.title: What do I do if the zipper seems stiff and wonâ€™t zip easily the first time I use the Pod?
settings.subtitle: It is normal for a new UTWPod™ to be stiff and a little more difficult to zip and unzip. Pods “stretch out” slightly with use. If the zipper separates slightly when it is new, hold the Pod firmly and push the zipper up and down a few times. The zipper typically re-connects and with ongoing use, is completely functional.

settings.title: My plastic is very wrinkly?
settings.subtitle: Try setting your Pod up in the sun for a few hours. The heat from the sun can greatly reduce the wrinkles and also makes zipping easier.

settings.title: Can I use the Pod on a cement surface?
settings.subtitle: We discourage the use of the pop-up Pod on concrete or asphalt as friction can cause a tear in the floor. Pods with tears in the floor resulting from use on concrete or asphalt are not covered by our warranty.

settings.title: I canâ€™t fold my pop-up Pod! Can you help?
settings.subtitle: Check out our folding videos for demonstrations on how to open and fold your pop-up WeatherPod™.

settings.title: How do I clean my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle: A soft brush and warm soapy water can be used to clean your pop-up Pod™.

settings.title: Can I put a heater in my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle: NO! This is a potential safety hazard. (You won’t need one, trust us!)

settings.title: Can I store my pop-up Pod in its case if it is wet?
settings.subtitle: Under the Weather® pop-up Pods can be folded and placed in case for a few hours after being exposed to wet conditions. If storing your pop-up Pod in it’s case for more than 24 hours, open the Pod and let it air out and dry thoroughly before returning it to it’s carry case for longer-term storage.

settings.title: What if my WeatherPodâ„¢ has dirty windows?
settings.subtitle: The plastic windows on a UTWPod™ are easily cleanable. Dampen a clean washcloth with water and gently wipe both sides of the windows. Then wipe the windows using a dry cloth to dry the windows and avoid streaks.

settings.title: Can I customize and/or put a logo on my pop-up WeatherPodâ„¢?
settings.subtitle: Yes, rooftops (sold separately) for pop-up WeatherPods™ can be customized with up to 20 letters/characters and are available in a variety of colors. Visit our SHOP for more details.

settings.title: Can I get a screen for the windows?
settings.subtitle: Our exclusive, pop-up screen insert, the MyPod™ Screen Insert, pops up in seconds and fits inside our pop-up Pod pop-up tents. It is a snug fit inside the MyPod™ but also fits inside the OriginalPod™ and XLPod™. The MyPodScreen™ is the perfect accessory when you also want protection from bugs and insects. SHOP HERE.

settings.title: Do you offer a pop-up Pod that accommodates a stroller or wheelchair?
settings.subtitle: The XLDeluxePod™ features a back door for easy stroller and wheelchair access. A sturdier wire frame allows for wheels to roll over the back door lip and wider, less tapered shape also comfortably fits our exclusive Under the Under the Weather® Bench. Please call us for more information: (513) 871-0400. Monday-Friday, 8:30am – 5:00pm ET.

settings.title: Can two chairs fit inside?
settings.subtitle: The MyPodDoubleX™ is designed for two people, inside measurements are 46” x 46”, and it perfectly fits our Under the Weather® Bench or two smaller soccer chairs. The ShadePod is also designed to fit two people. The MegaPod™ can fit up to four people and the MonsterMeshPod™ can fit up to six people.For more info, visit our SHOP.

settings.title: What colors are available for my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle: Colors are subject to additions and changes. Visit our SHOP for the most up-to-date color selection.

settings.title: Do you offer a discount for bulk/larger quantity orders?
settings.subtitle: We do not offer discounts for bulk orders; however, we can save you money on the shipping cost per WeatherPod™ if you ship several Pods to the same location. Contact support@undertheweatherpods.com.

settings.title: Do you sell to wholesalers?
settings.subtitle: We do not sell to wholesalers. We do offer free shipping on orders of 18 or more. Please contact us at support@undertheweatherpods.com for more detail.

settings.title: What if I purchase an Under the WeatherÂ® Pod somewhere else?
settings.subtitle:
Unfortunately, many popular brands have imitations, products which have a logo and look alike, but the quality is not comparable. Unless your UTWPod™ is purchased on our Under the Weather® website or at DICK’s Sporting Goods, Field & Stream, Scheels, or Walmart, chances are it is not ours and the quality will not be comparable. We do also sell on Amazon, but be sure to check that you are purchasing from our Under the Weather® store to guarantee quality and service. While unfortunate, we actively monitor and enforce our patents and trademarks. You know what they say, "If it sounds too good to be true, it probably is!" Be smart and help us protect our brand’s integrity by spreading the word!

Under the Weather® is not responsible for products purchased through any third-party retailers, distributors, or resellers. Products purchased through any third-party retailers, distributors, or resellers must be returned/exchanged directly through that company. All applicable return requests and warranty claims will follow policies according to the company that sold you the product. Customer support related such as return requests or warranty claims must be directed to the company that sold you the product.

UNDER THE WEATHER® WARRANTY AND RETURN POLICY DOES NOT APPLY TO PRODUCTS PURCHASED THROUGH ANY THIRD PARTY RETAILERS, DISTRIBUTORS, OR RESELLERS.

settings.title: Do you ship outside of the Continental U.S.?
settings.subtitle: We currently offer shipping to Canada and Australia/NZ only. For shipping to Canada, visit our Canadian store. For any other questions about shipping, contact us at support@undertheweatherpods.com.

settings.title: How long does it take to ship/receive my order?
settings.subtitle:
We ship orders Monday through Friday during normal business hours. Ground shipments are processed and shipped in 1-3 business days. Expedited orders placed after 2:00 PM (ET) will be processed the following business day. Holidays may affect processing schedule.

Saturday delivery is not guaranteed and subject to carrier availability. Please visit UPS.com for more information.Holidays may affect processing schedule.

Transit time depends on your location and we ship from our warehouse in Cincinnati, Ohio. Most shipments arrive within 2-5 business days.

settings.title: What is the warranty on my UTWPodâ„¢?
settings.subtitle:
All products purchased directly through Under the Weather® (UTW™) have a 90-day warranty against manufacturer defects. These warranties do not apply to any defect, failure, or damage caused by improper use such as folding and storage, or improper or inadequate maintenance and care. Under the Weather® will provide a return shipping label.

Items NOT covered under warranty include but are not limited to:
• Wire damage caused by improper folding
• Damage caused by use on pavement, asphalt, gravel, etc.
• Damage caused by improper storage
• Damage or odor caused by tobacco products
• Damage caused by pets
• Damage caused by heaters or open flames

Under the Weather® is not responsible for products purchased through any third party retailers, distributors, or resellers. Products purchased through any third-party retailers, distributors, or resellers must be returned/exchanged directly through that company. All applicable return requests and warranty claims will follow policies according to the company that sold you the product. Customer support related such as return requests or warranty claims must be directed to the company that sold you the product.

UNDER THE WEATHER WARRANTY AND RETURN POLICY DOES NOT APPLY TO PRODUCTS PURCHASED THROUGH ANY THIRD PARTY RETAILERS, DISTRIBUTORS, OR RESELLERS.

settings.title: What do I do if I have a warranty claim?
settings.subtitle: In order to submit a warranty claim request, please go to the Lookup Order Page. There you can enter submit a refund, exchange, or credit request, and check status of your request online.

settings.title: Can I return my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle:
Products may be returned or exchanged within 30 days of purchase. Products (including stakes and roofs) must be returned in the same condition in which they were received, be in the original carrying bag, and must include order number and/or proof of purchase. Customized items are not eligible for refund. Original shipping and handling charges will not be refunded.

In order to submit a refund request, please go to the Lookup Order Page. There you can enter submit a refund, exchange, or credit request, and check status of your request online.

settings.title: Investing in our community-at-large is an essential part of Under the Weather's community outreach efforts and in supporting our loyal customers. How can you help?
settings.subtitle:
DONATION REQUEST GUIDELINES: The guidelines below detail Under the Weather's policies and procedures while reviewing requests for donations. While we attempt to accommodate as many requests as possible, please be aware we cannot guarantee that every donation request will be met. All requests will be reviewed and we will be in touch to let you know what, if anything, can be donated.

Requests submitted without 501 c3 status and/or a Tax ID number will not be considered.Organizations are limited to one request per year. We do not donate items as door prizes or to raise funds for operating expenses.Requests for donations may be sent to support@undertheweatherpods.com
